scripts.test: cd frontend && npm run update-blog-test && npm run generate && cd ../functions && npm run serve
scripts.dev: cd frontend && npm run update-blog-test && npm run dev
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run update-blog-test && npm run build
scripts.prod: cd frontend && npm ci && npm run update-blog-test && npm start
scripts.start: cd frontend && npm run update-blog-test && npm run build && npm start
